0.text: Innate: Rammus'  basic attacks deal 10 (+ 10% armor) bonus magic damage  on-hit, increased to 15 (+ 15% armor) during  Defensive Ball Curl.
0.html: Innate: Rammus' basic attacks deal 10 (+ 10% armor) bonus magic damage on-hit, increased to 15 (+ 15% armor) during Defensive Ball Curl.
markedPassages: on-hit
Defensive Ball Curl

0.text: Active: Rammus  channels for up to 6 seconds to roll into a ball, gaining  25% − 39.17% (based on level) bonus total movement speed per second over the duration, up to a maximum of 150% − 235% (based on level). Powerball can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or when  interrupted.
0.html:
Active: Rammus channels for up to 6 seconds to roll into a ball, gaining  25% − 39.17% (based on level) bonus total movement speed per second over the duration, up to a maximum of 150% − 235% (based on level).

Powerball can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or when interrupted.
markedPassages: channels
25% − 39.17% (based on level) bonus total movement speed
25% − 39.17% (based on level) bonus total movement speed
interrupted

1.text: Rammus stops rolling upon colliding with an enemy, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and  knocking them back 125 units, though not through terrain. Enemies hit are then  stunned and  revealed for 0.4 seconds, as well as  slowed for 1 second.
1.html: Rammus stops rolling upon colliding with an enemy, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and knocking them back 125 units, though not through terrain. Enemies hit are then stunned and revealed for 0.4 seconds, as well as slowed for 1 second.
markedPassages: knocking them back
stunned
revealed
slowed

0.text: Active: Rammus enters a defensive stance for 6 seconds, gaining  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance. While active, enemies that use a basic attack  on-hit against Rammus are dealt magic damage equal to  Spiked Shell's bonus damage.
0.html: Active: Rammus enters a defensive stance for 6 seconds, gaining  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance. While active, enemies that use a basic attack on-hit against Rammus are dealt magic damage equal to Spiked Shell's bonus damage.
markedPassages: bonus armor
bonus magic resistance
on-hit
Spiked Shell's

1.text: Rammus'  basic attacks extend the remaining duration of Defensive Ball Curl by 0.4 seconds, up to a maximum of 4 additional seconds.
1.html: Rammus' basic attacks extend the remaining duration of Defensive Ball Curl by 0.4 seconds, up to a maximum of 4 additional seconds.

2.text: Defensive Ball Curl can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically upon casting  Powerball.
2.html: Defensive Ball Curl can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically upon casting Powerball.
markedPassages: Powerball

3.text: Recast: Rammus ends Defensive Ball Curl.

0.text: Active: Rammus  taunts the target enemy  champion or  monster for a duration and gains  bonus attack speed for the same duration.
0.html: Active: Rammus taunts the target enemy champion or monster for a duration and gains  bonus attack speed for the same duration.
markedPassages: taunts
champion
monster
bonus attack speed

1.text: The duration of the bonus attack speed continuously refreshes during  Powerball,  Defensive Ball Curl and  Soaring Slam.
1.html: The duration of the bonus attack speed continuously refreshes during Powerball, Defensive Ball Curl and Soaring Slam.
markedPassages: Powerball
Defensive Ball Curl
Soaring Slam

0.text: Active: Rammus  leaps to the target location with  immunity to crowd control. Upon arrival, he creates an impact that deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  slows them for 1.5 seconds. The impact deals increased damage at the epicenter if Soaring Slam was cast further than 800 units, capped at 1700 units with 50% increased damage.
0.html: Active: Rammus leaps to the target location with immunity to crowd control. Upon arrival, he creates an impact that deals magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them for 1.5 seconds. The impact deals increased damage at the epicenter if Soaring Slam was cast further than 800 units, capped at 1700 units with 50% increased damage.
markedPassages: leaps
immunity to crowd control
slows

1.text: If Soaring Slam was cast during  Powerball, enemies within the epicenter are also  knocked up for 0.75 seconds and are dealt  Powerball's damage.  Powerball will not collide with enemies during the dash, and its channel will be maintained for the dash and end afterwards.
1.html: If Soaring Slam was cast during Powerball, enemies within the epicenter are also knocked up for 0.75 seconds and are dealt Powerball's damage. Powerball will not collide with enemies during the dash, and its channel will be maintained for the dash and end afterwards.
markedPassages: Powerball
knocked up
Powerball's
Powerball
100 / 130 / 160 / 190 / 220 (+ 100% AP)
100 / 130 / 160 / 190 / 220 (+ 100% AP)

2.text: The impact causes 3 aftershocks to burst from the area over 3.5 seconds, each one dealing magic damage to enemies within and applying the initial  slow, which stacks up to 4 times.
2.html: The impact causes 3 aftershocks to burst from the area over 3.5 seconds, each one dealing magic damage to enemies within and applying the initial slow, which stacks up to 4 times.
markedPassages: slow

3.text: Soaring Slam's damage affects structures and is doubled against  turrets.
3.html: Soaring Slam's damage affects structures and is doubled against turrets.
markedPassages: turrets

4.text: Soaring Slam will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
4.html: Soaring Slam will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Soaring Slam will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
